main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a dozen star-like objects in the southeast sky in Merrick, New York on October 11, 1966.
interesting points: The observer compared the objects to stars but noted they appeared brighter., The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes., The observer indicated no sound was associated with the objects., The observer felt motivated to report the sighting due to recent publicity about UFOs., The objects seemed to fade in and out, with no defined maneuvering pattern.
witness description: The observer is a 49-year-old male from Merrick, NY, described as sincere and objective.
